title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.7 - Records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.7 - Records and reports

State Regulations

Each social services official shall record and report
such information as is requested by the department to insure compliance with
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
397.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
